name: FiloDataBroker
tagline: Monetize CSV datasets with NFT-gated access and Filecoin storage
description: A proof-of-concept platform that helps data providers monetize their structured CSV datasets while token-gating access to valuable information. Uses Filecoin Web Services (FWS) for decentralized storage, Synapse SDK for seamless integration, FilCDN for fast data retrieval, and NFT-based access control for private data columns. Features include automatic dataset preservation fees, 7-day storage guarantees, and MCP server integration for LLM applications.
